CustomField.formula:
IF( Put_This_Contact_First__c = TRUE,
IF(Spouse_Client_Record__pc <> "", "Dear " & FirstName & " & " & Spouse_Client_Record__pr.FirstName & ",","")
,
IF(Spouse_Client_Record__pc <> "", "Dear " & Spouse_Client_Record__pr.FirstName & " & " & FirstName & ",","")
)
CustomField.label: Joint Informal Addressee
